positions.title: Analytics Consultant

projects.title: Image Content Analysis System
projects.description: Developed a Python-based pipeline that combines computer vision and NLP for image understanding. The system classifies images using a fine-tuned ResNet model, generates descriptive summaries using BART, and performs secondary classification for validation. Containerized the solution with Docker and exposed it as a REST API.
